sentences.english: The woman's beauty made her a rare bird indeed.

sentences.english: The love-drama about talented scholars and beautiful girls is main form of the Yuan opera.

sentences.english: These books are all about talented scholars and lovely ladies.

sentences.english: Maybe we shall have a daughter who will be the loveliest woman ever seen among men.

sentences.english: Wuhan"is delighted for frain", the Shui Shang wedding, attract to come to genius and beauty absolutely myriad.

sentences.english: Well, I think Christine Lagarde was the best person for the job.

sentences.english: Natural beauties collocation, only envy mandarin duck not envy immortal.

sentences.english: From the door comes Satan's daughter, and it only goes to show. You know.

sentences.english: The beautiful women from antiquity she impersonates always call themselves "Nu Jia".
sentences.chinese: 她扮演的古代佳人总是自称“奴家”。

sentences.english: A green gown, the fog blurred, a beauty on the water.
sentences.chinese: 绿草萋萋，白雾迷离，有位佳人靠水而居。

sentences.english: Good girls, Emily this beautiful woman, after a shared level of available recruits★

sentences.chinese: 约翰是递补这个空缺的最佳人选。

sentences.english: I'm not sure Pretty in Pink is very interesting to boys.
sentences.chinese: 我不确定《红粉佳人》对他们来说是有趣的。
